original_text: Now Eli, who was very old, heard about everything his sons were doing to all Israel and how they slept with the women who served at the entrance to the tent of meeting.
korean_text: 엘리가 매우 늙었더니 그의 아들들이 온 이스라엘에게 행한 모든 일과 회막 문에서 수종 드는 여인들과 동침하였음을 듣고

sentences.original_text: Now Eli, who was very old,
his sons were doing to all Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들이 온 이스라엘에게 하고 있는

sentences.original_text: and how they slept with the women
